zh-cn: 孝懿贞惠顺哲恭仁俪天襄圣庄皇后

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗朱载坖的元配妻子，生前为裕王妃，去世后被追尊为皇后。
description.en: The first wife of Emperor Muzong of Ming (Zhu Zaiji). She was the Princess of Yu during her lifetime and was posthumously honored as Empress.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十二位皇帝，孝懿庄皇后的丈夫。
description.en: The 12th emperor of the Ming Dynasty, husband of Empress Xiaoyizhuang.

description.zh-cn: 孝懿庄皇后之父，后被追封为德平伯。
description.en: Father of Empress Xiaoyizhuang, posthumously granted the title of Count of Deping.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗与孝懿庄皇后的长子，早夭，被追封为宪怀太子。
description.en: The eldest son of Emperor Muzong and Empress Xiaoyizhuang, who died in infancy and was posthumously named Crown Prince Xianhuai.

en: Zhu Yiling, Prince Jing of Ming

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗与孝懿庄皇后的次子，早夭，被追封为靖悼王。
description.en: The second son of Emperor Muzong and Empress Xiaoyizhuang, who died in infancy and was posthumously named Prince Jingdao.

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗与孝懿庄皇后的长女，早夭。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Emperor Muzong and Empress Xiaoyizhuang, who died in infancy.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十三位皇帝，即位后追尊嫡母孝懿庄皇后。
description.en: The 13th emperor of the Ming Dynasty, who posthumously honored his legal mother, Empress Xiaoyizhuang, after ascending the throne.

description.zh-cn: 明朝北直隶顺天府下辖的州，为孝懿庄皇后出生地。
description.en: A zhou (prefecture) under Shuntian Prefecture, North Zhili, during the Ming Dynasty, and the birthplace of Empress Xiaoyizhuang.

description.zh-cn: 中国明朝裕王的正室封号。
description.en: The title for the primary consort of the Prince of Yu during the Ming Dynasty in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代皇帝正配的称号。
description.en: The title of an emperor's primary consort in ancient China.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第十一位皇帝，明穆宗朱载坖之父。
description.en: The 11th emperor of the Ming Dynasty, father of Emperor Muzong (Zhu Zaiji).

description.zh-cn: 明穆宗朱载坖的生母。
description.en: The birth mother of Emperor Muzong of Ming (Zhu Zaiji).

description.zh-cn: 孝懿庄皇后是明穆宗朱载坖的元配妻子（正室）。
description.en: Empress Xiaoyizhuang was the first and primary wife of Emperor Muzong of Ming (Zhu Zaiji).

description.zh-cn: 李铭是孝懿庄皇后的父亲。
description.en: Li Ming was the father of Empress Xiaoyizhuang.

description.zh-cn: 朱翊𫟸是孝懿庄皇后的长子。
description.en: Zhu Yijun was the eldest son of Empress Xiaoyizhuang.

description.zh-cn: 朱翊𫟸是明穆宗朱载坖的长子。
description.en: Zhu Yijun was the eldest son of Emperor Muzong of Ming (Zhu Zaiji).

description.zh-cn: 朱翊铃是孝懿庄皇后的次子。
description.en: Zhu Yiling was the second son of Empress Xiaoyizhuang.

description.zh-cn: 朱翊铃是明穆宗朱载坖的次子。
description.en: Zhu Yiling was the second son of Emperor Muzong of Ming (Zhu Zaiji).

description.zh-cn: 蓬莱公主是孝懿庄皇后的长女。
description.en: Princess Penglai was the eldest daughter of Empress Xiaoyizhuang.

description.zh-cn: 蓬莱公主是明穆宗朱载坖的长女。
description.en: Princess Penglai was the eldest daughter of Emperor Muzong of Ming (Zhu Zaiji).

description.zh-cn: 1553年二月，李氏嫁给朱载坖，被封为裕王妃，直至1558年四月去世。
description.en: In February 1553, Lady Li married Zhu Zaiji and was created Princess of Yu, a title she held until her death in April 1558.

description.zh-cn: 朱载坖即位后，追谥李氏为孝懿皇后。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Muzong (Zhu Zaiji) posthumously honored Lady Li with the title Empress Xiaoyi.

description.zh-cn: 明神宗即位后，追尊其嫡母孝懿庄皇后，加上谥号“贞惠顺哲恭仁俪天襄圣”。
description.en: After ascending the throne, the Wanli Emperor further honored his legal mother, Empress Xiaoyizhuang, with the additional posthumous title 'Zhenhui Shun-zhe Gongren Litian Xiangsheng'.

description.zh-cn: 朱载坖是朱厚熜的儿子。
description.en: Zhu Zaiji was the son of Zhu Houcong.

description.zh-cn: 朱载坖是孝恪皇后的儿子。
description.en: Zhu Zaiji was the son of Empress Xiaoke.
